name: Space Trash (bilalakil)
description:
Space Trash is Doodad Games' magnum opus. A symphony of movement and trash that transcends the limits of modern game design.

You are a lonely scrapper, adrift in the vast expanse of space. As you slowly navigate your way through mountains of trash and deadly laser volleys, take the time to ponder this: Where are you? What are you doing with your life? Are you no better than the trash surrounding you?

HOW TO:

  • W/S or Up/Down to move up/down
  • A/D or Left/Right to rotate
  • Don't crash into death trash (the really big ones)

INFO:

Made for #AusGGJ Global Game Jam 2021. Original game jam page here

Credits:

  • Bilal Akil: Suffering Dev (See more of his/Doodad Games' games at www.doodad.games / Twitter @bilalakil)
  • William Chen: Game Design + Artistic Concept
  • Henry Chen: SFX + Assistant Artist
  • Ryan Goodwin: Musical Genius (Hear more of his music at: virtuallyryan.com / Twitter @VirtuallyRyanAu)
  • SFX from: Zapsplat.com
  • Font (Badaboom BB) from: Dafont.com
  • Made witih Unity

Open source on GitHub
